name: Spiderhat
description:
(This game was made for The Jimquisition 2018 Spiderhead Contest)

Spiderhat is a friendly little Art Asset with a Top Hat.

His greatest wish is to get to the Steam Store. But there are a lot of shitty game projects out there trying to get him.

Help Spiderhat avoid those shitty games and lead him to the Steam Store.

Controls: UP/DOWN to move, ESC to exit

Playtime: The way to the Steam Store takes 2 Minutes

Creation Time: ~4 Hours

Made with Game Maker Studio 2

Made by Sinnesloeschen Games
